Name: Absorbent
Description: More absorbent than other brands.\nYour armor gets stronger in water and rain.

Name: Aftershock
Description: Laevatein!\nThis weapon deals additional magical damage on fully-charged hits.
Comment: Deals additional magic damage on fully charged hits

Name: Alien
Description: The stats feel off...\n..as if they're changing! Maybe time will tell?
Comment: 800 points are created, and randomly distributed to durability, speed, and damage. Every 3.6 seconds, one of the distributed points is applied to the tool’s stats, unless you are currently breaking a block. Each point is worth 1 durability, 0.007 speed, or 0.005 damage.

Name: Alien
Description: The stats feel off...\n..as if they're changing! Maybe time will tell?
Comment: 800 points are created, and randomly distributed to durability, speed, and damage. Every 3.6 seconds, one of the distributed points is applied to the tool’s stats, unless you are currently breaking a block. Each point is worth 1 durability, 0.007 speed, or 0.005 damage.

Name: Alpha Fur
Description: Chilling\nChills targets or attackers.
Comment: Freezes enemies temporarily, significantly lowering their movement speed

Name: Alpha Fur
Description: Chilling\nChills targets or attackers.
Comment: Freezes enemies temporarily, significantly lowering their movement speed

Name: Ambitious
Description: On your way to glory!\nYou gain additional XP.

Name: Anti-Corrosion
Description: For the times when you splash the chemical\nEvery tick, there is a small chance that the holder's poison is healed (when held in hand).
Comment: Chance to heal the wielders poison while held

Name: Anti-Gravity
Description: Onwards!\nThe arrow will maintain its height and will not be effected by gravity for the duration of the flight. Where you aim, it flies.
Comment: Projectile is immune to the pull of gravity

Name: Apocalypse
Description: The end times...\nYour victim becomes moribund and is afflicted with increasing levels of Wither.
Comment: Struck enemies gain a stack of Wither

Name: Apprentice
Description: Power of study\n1/10 of incoming damage becomes experience but hurts you 10% more.

Name: Aquadynamic
Description: It's getting wet in here!\nThe tool is unhindered by water and loves rainy evenings.
Comment: Tool is not affected by being underwater, and increases mining speed during rain

Name: Aquaspeed
Description: It's getting wet in here!\nThe armor is unhindered by water and loves rainy evenings.

Name: Aridiculous
Description: Turn up the heat!\nThe tool works better in hotter environments.
Comment: Mining speed and attack speed is increased in drier environments

Name: Aridiculous
Description: Turn up the heat!\nThe armor works better in hotter environments.
Comment: Mining speed and attack speed is increased in drier environments

Name: Aspect of the Phoenix
Description: Heroes never die!\nThis armour sacrifices itself to save its wearer from death.

Name: Astral
Description: Shimmering!\nThis tool can be attuned to a constellation at an Attunement Altar.
Comment: See the "Tool Attunement" tab for information about attunements

Name: Astral
Description: Shimmering!\nThis armour piece can be attuned to a constellation at an Attunement Altar.
Comment: See the "Tool Attunement" tab for information about attunements

Name: Aura Affinity
Description: Warp included!\nThis armour reduces vis costs.

Name: Aura Siphon
Description: Wex trionis!\nThis weapon converts some damage dealt to bonus mana.
Comment: Converts damage dealt into mana

Name: Aura-Infused
Description: Into the breach!\nThis armour passively generates mana.

Name: Autoforge
Description: So hot, it fixes itself!\nThe armor repairs itself in fire.

Name: Autosmelt
Description: A furnace in tool form!\nHarvested blocks get smelted.
Comment: Broken blocks will automatically be smelted

Name: Baconlicious
Description: BACON!\nHitting things sometimes gives bacon.
Comment: 0.05% chance for slain enemies to drop bacon. 0.005% chance for broken blocks to drop bacon

Name: Baconlicious
Description: BACON!\nGetting hit sometimes gives bacon.
Comment: 0.05% chance for slain enemies to drop bacon. 0.005% chance for broken blocks to drop bacon

Name: Battle Furor
Description: Hwæt!\nThis weapon grants its wielder increasing attack damage on fully-charged hits.
Comment: Repeated fully charged attacks increase damage

Name: Blasting
Description: I don't even think once!\nThis tool produces explosive results.
Comment: Chance to cause an explosion, dealing bonus damage

Name: Blessed
Description: Undead, beware.\nWeakens undead on contact.

Name: Blind Bandit
Description: Pulling a ... someone.\nA mob called the "Blind Bandit" will sometimes be summoned for a limited time after you attack or are attacked. She will attack hostile mobs, and will also attack those who dare attack her (except you), piercing armor on mobs.
Comment: Fully charged hits have a chance of summoning a Blind Bandit to fight for you temporarily

Name: Blind Rage
Description: Who said you need to see your enemies?\nDeal double damage when blinded.
Comment: Increased damage when blinded

Name: Blizzard II
Description: Ice-ice baby!\nFreezes enemies in a block of ice for 15 seconds with added knockback, and deals additional dragon frost damage.

Name: Blood Lust
Description: I want more blood.\nAdds life essence to your soul network when killing.

Name: Bloodbound
Description: The multitudinous seas incarnadine...\nThis armour siphons its user's life essence to prevent damage to itself.
Comment: Tool will drain from the users LP network to repair itself

Name: Bloodbound
Description: The multitudinous seas incarnadine...\nThis tool siphons its user's life essence to prevent damage to itself.
Comment: Tool will drain from the users LP network to repair itself

Name: Bloody Mary
Description: Brought to you by the legendary Queen of England...\nDeals bonus damage depending on the amount of health already lost by the target. Also, a chance to drop a Coagulated Blood for each hit.
Comment: Increases damage based on total HP loss of enemy; Chance to drop Coagulated Blood on strike

Name: Botanical
Description: I eat zombies for breakfast\nIncreases the amount of modifier slots; the effect stacks greatly.
Comment: Gain +1 modifier (per stack)

Name: Bouncy
Description: Always a bounce house!\nYour armor tends to bounce around.
Comment: Protects well from fall damage, ease of moving around.

Name: Breakable
Description: This side up!\nProjectiles have a 50% chance to break on impact.
Comment: Projectile has a 50% chance of breaking on impact

Name: Brown Magic
Description: You're weird.\nPress the "set portal" key (default "N") to set a virtual portal on the block you are pointing at. By default, press "Y" to teleport there (if there is enough space).
Comment: Press the "set portal" key (default "N") to set a virtual portal on the block you are pointing at. Press "Y" to teleport there at the cost of durability.

Name: Bulwark
Description: Blocked!\nThis armour reduces incoming damage by one heart, to a minimum of one heart.

Name: Calcic
Description: For stronger bones.\nMilk rejuvenates both you and your armor.
Comment: Heals you, repears armor. Very useful.

Name: Cam Dai Bay
Description: No, it's not some bay in Vietnam!\nIf the player is attacked and is blocking, inflicts the player's negative status effects on the attacker.

Name: Cascading
Description: It's all coming down!\nThis tool destroys falling blocks in columns.
Comment: When breaking falling blocks (sand etc), break all falling blocks above it

Name: Celestial
Description: Abyssal wings!\nThis armour grants creative flight.

Name: Chain Lightning
Description: Full bridge rectifier!\nThis weapon's fully-charged attacks have a chance of arcing to nearby enemies.
Comment: Fully charged attacks have a chance of causing chain lightning between enemies

Name: Cheap
Description: More bang for your buck!\nIncreases durability gained when repairing the armor.
Comment: Increases durability regained when repairing

Name: Cheap
Description: More bang for your buck!\nIncreases durability gained when repairing the tool.
Comment: Increases durability regained when repairing

Name: Cheapskate
Description: Cheeky!\nStone is bad. Your tool has less durability.
Comment: Overall durability decreased

Name: Cheapskate
Description: Might be a knockoff!\nStone is bad. Your armor has less durability.
Comment: Overall durability decreased

Name: Chilling Touch
Description: Ice is nice!\nThis armour briefly slows attackers.

Name: Chunky
Description: Makes your tool or weapon randomly drop Mob Chunks.
Comment: Hit enemies have a chance to drop their mob chunk on death

Name: Cold-Blooded
Description: Savage!\nDeal increased damage to targets at full health.
Comment: Increases damage against targets at full HP

Name: Combustible
Description: This armor is on fiiiire!\nSets fire to surrounding creatures when ignited.

Name: Condensing
Description: Try not to think about it.\nSlain foes and broken blocks may leave behind a smattering of neutrons.
Comment: Breaking blocks and killing enemies has a rare chance of leaving behind neutronium pieces

Name: Corrupting
Description: A glimpse of the void...\nThis weapon inflicts increasing wither on fully-charged hits.
Comment: Struck enemies gain a stack of Wither

Name: Crude
Description: Armor is for cowards!\nBonus damage against unarmored targets.
Comment: Deals +5% (per stack) damage vs unarmored enemies

Name: Crumbling
Description: Crumble rumble rumble\nThe tool breaks soft blocks that don't need a tool faster.
Comment: Increases mining speed by 50% on blocks that do not need a tool

Name: Crystalline
Description: You could buy a very small piano!\nThis weapon deals greater damage at higher durability.
Comment: Weapons deal more damage at higher durability levels

Name: Crystalys
Description: I'm not afraid of the darkness!\nThis weapon shatters soul networks to manifest weak blood shards.
Comment: Killing enemies has a chance to drop Blood Shards

Name: Culling
Description: Only the worthy will survive.\nThis weapon deals increased damage to enemies with less health than its wielder.
Comment: Weapon will deal more damage to enemies with less HP than the player. Give +1 damage for each heart difference (for each 2HP). Cannot be more that x2 of original damage.

Name: Cycle of Life
Description: From one to another.\nWhen your tool is damaged you are healed for the damaged amount.Piezo
Comment: Damaging the tool will heal you for the equivalent amount

Name: Deadly Precision
Description: Just buy six daedalus 4Head\nThis weapon deals greatly increased damage on critical strikes.
Comment: Critical hits are stronger

Name: Death Cloud
Description: I Am Become Death\nSummons a plague cloud on use, which deals half the damage of the tool!
Comment: Chance to summon a Plague Cloud when attacking, which deals half the total damage of the tool

Name: Dense
Description: Hard...er.\nYour armor lasts longer when it has less durability.
Comment: Decreases durability use as durability decreases

Name: Dense
Description: Hard...er.\nYour tool lasts longer when it has less durability.
Comment: Decreases durability use as durability decreases

Name: Depth Digger
Description: Fresh-air-a-phobia?\nThis tool becomes more efficient at lower elevations.
Comment: Increases mining speed as your Y coordinate lowers

Name: Devil's Strength
Description: Rivaling Satan...\nBonus damage to non-Overworld mobs.
Comment: Increases damage against non-Overworld enemies

Name: Dire-Hit
Description: It's super effective!\nYour tool will always land a critical hit so long as you are at full health!
Comment: All hits will be critical hits if you at max HP

Name: Direct
Description: It's mine, all mine!\nTeleports mined things directly into your inventory.
Comment: Teleports mined blocks directly into your inventory

Name: Diseased
Description: Fleas on Rats!\nOpponents get inflicted with Plague.
Comment: Struck enemies gain the Plague

Name: Divine Grace
Description: Support's on the way!\nThis armour amplifies received healing.

Name: Dramatic
Description: What a rush!\nMight save you in a pinch? Who knows!

Name: Dunans Transport
Description: The FedEx of one square foot of land\nBonus armor protection and toughness for riding players.

Name: Duritae
Description: Doesn't taste as good as it sounds.\nYour tool lasts longer ...most of the time.
Comment: Using the tool has a chance to increase durability used, decrease it, nullify it or do nothing

Name: Duritae
Description: Doesn't taste as good as it sounds.\nYour armor lasts longer...most of the time.
Comment: Using the tool has a chance to increase durability used, decrease it, nullify it or do nothing

Name: Ecological
Description: Green Power!\nRenewable resources are so good, they regenerate by themselves!
Comment: Slowly repairs over time

Name: Ecological
Description: Green Power!\nRenewable resources are so good, they regenerate by themselves!
Comment: Slowly repairs over time

Name: Electric
Description: HAYO!\nThis armour consumes electricity before durability.
Comment: Tool will consume energy before durability

Name: Electric
Description: HAYO!\nThis tool consumes electricity before durability.
Comment: Tool will consume energy before durability

Name: Elemental
Description: Elemental...\nWhen gravity-affected blocks are destroyed, break all blocks of the same type above and below. Also, a chance to gain various benefits from a sucessful attack.
Comment: Gain random buffs when attacking enemies; When breaking gravity-affected blocks, break all blocks of the same type above and below

Name: Enderference
Description: Anti-Teleport!\nPrevents Endermen from teleporting around for a short time.
Comment: Prevents Endermen from teleporting temporarily after being hit

Name: Enderport
Description: Just in time!\nMight teleport you out of dangerous situations.

Name: Enderport
Description: Just in time!\nMight teleport you out of dangerous situations.

Name: Endspeed
Description: Quantum speed!\nProjectiles instantly travel to their destination.
Comment: Projectiles travel instantaneously

Name: Energized
Description: Batteries included!\nThis armour consumes an internal energy buffer before durability.
Comment: Tool will consume energy before durability

Name: Energized
Description: Batteries included!\nThis tool consumes an internal energy buffer before durability.
Comment: Tool will consume energy before durability

Name: Eternal Darkness
Description: Join the dark side...\nYour tool loves the dark so much;it does more damage in the dark.
Comment: Increases damage when the light level is low

Name: Eternity
Description: Falling in and out of time...\nThis armour grants the immortality effect.

Name: Evil Aura
Description: When held, creates an aura of evil that brings misfortune to the wielder.
Comment: When the tool is held, reduces the "luck" stat of the player. Also converts nearby grass/paths to dirt

Name: Evolved
Description: Balanced, as all things should be.\nThis tool uses energy and can be upgraded by fusion crafting.
Comment: Can be upgraded with draconic upgrades

Name: Evolved
Description: Balanced, as all things should be.\nThis armour grants an energy shield and can be upgraded by fusion crafting.
Comment: Can be upgraded with draconic upgrades

Name: Executor
Description: See ya! \nThis weapon deals bonus damage based on the target's missing health.

Name: Experience Boost
Description: Gives bonus XP when mining or slaying mobs.
Comment: Increases XP drops when mining blocks or killing enemies

Name: Explosive
Description: Ka-boom!\nAn explosion is created on each hit.
Comment: An explosion is created on impact

Name: Featherweight
Description: Light as a feather.\nYou're so light, you take less fall damage.

Name: Fertilizing
Description: Green terra!\nThis tool can be used to fertilize crops at a large durability cost.
Comment: Tool can be used as Fertilizer for a durability cost

Name: Flammable
Description: Can't have enough fire!\nBlocking blocks fire damage and getting hit sets the attacker on fire.
Comment: Blocking will block fire damage and getting hit sets the attacker on fire

Name: Fleet of Foot
Description: Stay still--I'm trying to shoot you!\nThis weapon grants a burst of speed to its wielder on fully-charged hits.
Comment: Grants Speed II for a short period after a fully charged attack

Name: Flying Knockback
Description: Up and At 'Um!\nThe arrow will inflict strong knockback when it hits an entity.
Comment: Projectile will strongly knock back impacted enemies

Name: Force of Impact
Description: Suffering is magic!\nThis weapon deals greater damage at high velocity.
Comment: Increases damage based on player velocity

Name: Fractured
Description: Hurt!\nYour tools damage is increased.
Comment: Overall tool damage is increased

Name: Fractured II
Description: Hurt!\nYour tools damage is increased.

Name: Freezing
Description: Winter is Coming\nSuccessful hits slow your target more and more.
Comment: Struck enemies gain a stack of Slowness

Name: Gaia's Wrath
Description: Light and darkness!\nThis weapon fires damaging beams when swung.
Comment: Fully charged hits fires a laser beam that consumes durability

Name: Gale Force
Description: Wind blow!\nThis armour grants increased flight speed.

Name: Glitch
Description: Catch an exception!\nDrops Glitch Heart sometimes when killing.

Name: Global Traveler
Description: Around the world... and back\nShift-right-click a block in order for items from broken blocks and killed entities to get transported in there if it is an inventory.
Comment: Shift right-click a container to bind it. Broken blocks and dropped items from killing mobs will be teleported there

Name: Good Friday Agreement
Description: Troubles over?\nIron golems will not attack a player having this trait.\n

Name: Griding
Description: Jump!\nJump on the Ore blocks to crush them into dust.

Name: Haoran's Cult
Description: Harry, harry on the wall, who's the hairiest of them all?\nWhen withered, reduces HP of all mobs in a certain range by 30% every second.

Name: Hearth's Embrace
Description: Heartwarming!\nThis armour extinguishes fires on its wearer, converting them to healing.

Name: Heavy
Description: Do you even lift?\nPrevents knockback.
Comment: Prevents knockback

Name: Heavy
Description: Do you even lift?\nPrevents knockback.
Comment: Prevents knockback

Name: Heavy Metal
Description: Heave-ho!\nIncreased knockback + Slowness on target.
Comment: Increases knockback and gives Slowness to hit enemies

Name: Hellish
Description: From down below!\nDeal bonus damage to non-Nether mobs.
Comment: Deals +4 (per stack) damage against non-Nether mobs

Name: Hive Defender
Description: For Queen and Colony!\nDeals +8 extra damage against death worms and +4 damage against non-arthropods.
Comment: Deals +8 damage against death worms, and +4 damage against non-arthropods

Name: Holy
Description: Radiant!\nDeal bonus damage to undead enemies.
Comment: Deals +5 (per stack) damage against undead enemies

Name: Hovering
Description: Free like the wind\nProjectiles move slower but don't mind gravity as much.
Comment: Projectile has a much straighter shot, but moves slower

Name: I'm a Superstar
Description: I am a superstar! [falls into the toilet]\nEffects depend on the player's attunement.

Name: In The Garage
Description: "In the garage where I belong..."\nDeals an additional 5 damage when player is not in direct sunlight.

Name: Indomitable
Description: Never give up!\nMakes your armor more effective.

Name: Infernal
Description: The latest in demonic fashion.\nExtra protection from non-Nether mobs.

Name: Inferno II
Description: Burn baby burn!\nSets enemies on fire for 15 seconds with added knockbacks, and deals additional dragon flame damage.

Name: Infinitum
Description: Proven by induction!\nThis equipment is indestructible.
Comment: Tool is unbreakable

Name: Insatiable
Description: Devour!\nDuring combat you deal more and more damage but also consume more and more durability.
Comment: Increases damage and durability use during combat

Name: Invigorating
Description: This feels great!\nSomehow, you feel healthier.

Name: Jagged
Description: Moves like jagged!\nEvery point durability lost increases damage.
Comment: Increases damage as more durability is used

Name: Juggernaut
Description: A titanic strike!\nThis weapon deals increased damage based on its wielder's current health.
Comment: Weapon will deal more damage scaling with the players current HP

Name: Light Metal
Description: Low-weight\nAttack and mining speed increases.
Comment: Increases attack speed and mining speed

Name: Lightweight
Description: Swift like the wind!\nIncreases your overall movement speed.
Comment: Increases mining speed and attack speed

Name: Lightweight
Description: Swift like the wind!\nIncreases the overall speed of your tool when mining and attacking.
Comment: Increases mining speed and attack speed

Name: Luminiferous
Description: Relativistic!\nThis weapon reveals the positions of struck enemies.
Comment: Causes Glowing on enemies for a few seconds

Name: Magically Brittle
Description: Has a random chance of breaking when it takes damage. Can break 'unbreakable' tools.
Comment: (Very low) Chance to completely break a tool. Can also break Unbreakable tools

Name: Magically Modifiable
Description: Adds 3 extra modifiers to a tool
Comment: Grants +3 modifiers

Name: Magnetic
Description: How do they work?!\nHitting things attracts nearby things?!
Comment: After breaking blocks or hitting enemies, items will be magnetised to the play temporarily

Name: Magnetic
Description: Attractive armor!\nItems can't help but be drawn to you.
Comment: After breaking blocks or hitting enemies, items will be magnetised to the play temporarily

Name: Magnetic
Description: How do they work?!\nHitting things attracts nearby things?!
Comment: After breaking blocks or hitting enemies, items will be magnetised to the play temporarily

Name: Magnetic
Description: Attractive armor!\nItems can't help but be drawn to you.
Comment: After breaking blocks or hitting enemies, items will be magnetised to the play temporarily

Name: Mana
Description: Rechargeable... with flowers\nMana can be used in place of durability, and can heal the tool over time.
Comment: Mana (Botania) can be used instead of durability; Will repair itself using Mana

Name: Mana Affinity
Description: Warp not included!\nThis armour reduces mana costs.

Name: Mana Affinity
Description: Warp not included!\nThis armour reduces mana costs.

Name: Mana-Infused
Description: Mining in the database?\nThis armour repairs itself using mana.
Comment: Tool will repair itself using mana

Name: Mana-Infused
Description: Mining in the database?\nThis tool repairs itself using mana.
Comment: Tool will repair itself using mana

Name: Mirabile Visu
Description: Wonderful to see\nOccasionally, a gold or diamond ore will appear in stone immediately surrounding you (at the cost of durability).

Name: Modifiable
Description: The infinite spring!\nThis equipment has additional free modifier slots.
Comment: Grants an extra modifier (1 per stack)

Name: Moldable
Description: Maître Chocolatier.\nBlend additional modifiers into your armor.
Comment: Gain 1 modifier

Name: Moldable
Description: Maître Chocolatier.\nBlend additional modifiers into your tool.
Comment: Gain 1 modifier

Name: Momentum
Description: Faster, keep going!\nMining blocks increases your speed, as long as you keep going.
Comment: Mining speed increases the longer you are mining

Name: Moon Voice
Description: The loneliness echo...\nGives strength on a full moon.
Comment: Increases attack damage during a Full Moon

Name: Morgan Le Fay
Description: Lancelot...\nBonus damage (ranging from 0.0 to 5.0:Gaussian distributed) is afflicted (it is absolute).
Comment: Deals bonus Magic damage (0.0-5.0; Gaussian; Absolute)

Name: Mortal Wounds
Description: A mortal reminder!\nThis weapon reduces the enemy's healing for a duration.
Comment: Hits temporarily reduce enemies healing

Name: Mundane
Description: Weapons are for chumps!\nBonus protection against unarmed attackers.

Name: Nature's Blessing
Description: Wonderful...\nA chance to drop bread per mob killed or block broken. Sometimes heals the player by a bit after killing a mob.
Comment: Chance to drop bread when killing enemies and mining blocks; Rare chance to heal after killing a mob

Name: Nature's Power
Description: Feel the power...\nAfter attacking a mob: 20% chance to burn target. 20% chance to give player Speed. 20% chance to give player Strength.
Comment: 20% chance to ignite target; 20% chance to give the player Speed; 20% chance to give the player Strength

Name: Nature's Wrath
Description: Nature's wrath burning...\nAfter attacking a mob, there is a chance to burn the target, as well as to heal the player.
Comment: Chance to ignite the enemy and heal the player

Name: Null Almighty
Description: The power of the trickster!\nThis armour grants 25% resistance to all incoming damage.

Name: Omnipotence
Description: Begone!\nThis tool defies the will of gods.
Comment: Deals damage to Creative players, break unbreakable blocks like Bedrock

Name: Opportunist
Description: I've been waiting for this!\nThis weapon deals increased damage to debuffed targets.
Comment: Deal more damage to enemies with a debuff

Name: Overflow
Description: -2147483648\nThere is a 25% probability that this weapon directly wipes off half of target's health each attack.

Name: Overwhelm
Description: Heavy is the hand...\nThis weapon deals greater damage to armoured targets.
Comment: Deals bonus damage against enemies wearing armour

Name: Petramor
Description: So much stone, must see it all!\nYour tool loves stone, it literally wants to absorb it (for durability).
Comment: Chance to consume stone/cobblestone in place of durability

Name: Petravidity
Description: So much stone, must see it all!\nYour armor loves stone, it operates better around it.

Name: Photosynthetic
Description: Photosynthesis... photosynthesis...\nThis tool absorbs sunlight to repair itself.
Comment: Absorbs sunlight to repair itself

Name: Photosynthetic
Description: Photosynthesis... photosynthesis...\nThis armour absorbs sunlight to repair itself.
Comment: Absorbs sunlight to repair itself

Name: Piezoelectric
Description: Electromechanical!\nThis weapon converts damage from fully-charged hits into usable energy.

Name: Poisonous
Description: Not exactly lead-free!\nPoisons enemies on hit.
Comment: Hit enemies gain Poison

Name: Poisonous
Description: So many to kill... so little time.\nPoisons enemies on contact.
Comment: Hit enemies gain Poison

Name: Portly Gentleman
Description: Testing nuclear bombs off the Korean coast, oh yeah!\nShift-right-click an entity to capture it (costs durability based on entity health). Press the "release entity" key (default "0") in order to release it.
Comment: Shift right-click an entity to capture it at the cost of durability. Press the "release entity" key (default "O") to release it.

Name: Possessed
Description: J'zhahar's will descends on the instrument of destruction crying out for the essences of life.

Name: Precipitate
Description: The last standing escape plan.\nThe less health you have, the speedier it is!
Comment: Tool mines faster when at low HP

Name: Prickly
Description: Ouch!\nNobody is safe from those thorns, they always hurt.
Comment: After hit, if target is still alive and was hit, deal 0.5+NUMBER, where NUMBER is the greater of -0.5 or 0.75*RANDOM, where RANDOM is a random number from 0-1 along a pseudorandom Gaussian curve. This damage is cactus type, bypasses armor, and is absolute.

Name: Prideful
Description: What's narcissism?\nYou're tougher after getting attacked, at the cost of durability.

Name: Prosperous
Description: Makes your tool or weapon randomly drop\nProsperity Shards
Comment: Tools have a chance to drop Prosperity Shards

Name: Psicological
Description: ...the reverse kind\nTools heal with Psi.
Comment: Tool heals with Psi mana

Name: Radiant
Description: Shines like the sun!\nThis armour briefly blinds attackers.

Name: Rage
Description: Where is physics!?\nCritical strike increases attack speed.
Comment: Critical hits increase attack speed

Name: Ratty
Description: Rat Patootie\nRandomly summons rats when used. If used in a fight, summoned rats will try to defend you!
Comment: Chance to spawn a rat when attacking mobs or breaking blocks

Name: Reactive
Description: They'll never get me in here!\nThis armour grants increasing damage resistance after being attacked.

Name: Rejuvenating
Description: Your weapons betray you!\nThis weapon applies regeneration to attacked targets.
Comment: Attacked enemies gain Regeneration

Name: Relentless
Description: Swift strikes!\nThis weapon induces a shorter invulnerability period in struck enemies.
Comment: Struck enemies invulnerability timer is reduced

Name: Researcher
Description: Based on your research in thaumonomicon, there are various effects!

Name: Rough
Description: Please don't touch.\nDamages attackers on contact based on durability.

Name: Ruination
Description: I met a traveller...\nThis weapon deals damage scaling with enemy health on fully-charged hits.
Comment: Tool deals percentage damage if struck enemy has full HP

Name: Sassy
Description: The sass...\nCrit on players and bosses.
Comment: All hits on players and bosses will be Critical hits

Name: Second Wind
Description: The wind... it is blowing...\nThis armour provides regeneration after being attacked.

Name: Sentient
Description: It knows what you've done...\nThis armour consumes demon will to increase its power.
Comment: Drains demonic will from Tartaric Gems to deal more damage

Name: Sentient
Description: It knows what you've done...\nThis tool consumes demon will to increase its power.
Comment: Drains demonic will from Tartaric Gems to deal more damage

Name: Shadowstep
Description: Nothing to see here...\nThis armour piece grants invisibility in the dark.

Name: Sharp
Description: Can even cut words!\nHitting an enemy leaves them bleeding for a short time.
Comment: Hit enemies gain Bleeding, dealing damage every 0.5 seconds

Name: Shielding
Description: Not so special now, huh?\nAdditional protection from magical attacks.

Name: Shocking
Description: Bzzzzzt!\nRunning around, breaking blocks or hitting things charges your tool. Hitting an enemy discharges it, dealing damage and providing a speed boost. Mining a block discharges it, giving a mining speed boost.
Comment: Running, breaking blocks and hitting enemies charges the tool. Hitting an enemy will provide a damage boost and discharge. Mining blocks will provide a temporary mining boost and discharge.

Name: Skeletal
Description: Tough as...bones?\nMakes your armor tougher.

Name: Slimey
Description: Eww, gooey!\nIt'll wash off.
Comment: Breaking a block has a 0.3% chance to spawn a slime

Name: Slimey
Description: Eww, gooey!\nIt'll wash off.
Comment: Breaking a block has a 0.3% chance to spawn a slime

Name: Slimey
Description: Eww, gooey!\nIt'll wash off.
Comment: Breaking a block has a 0.3% chance to spawn a slime

Name: Slimey
Description: Eww, gooey!\nIt'll wash off.
Comment: Breaking a block has a 0.3% chance to spawn a slime

Name: Slimey
Description: Eww, gooey!\nIt'll wash off.
Comment: Breaking a block has a 0.3% chance to spawn a slime

Name: Slimey
Description: Eww, gooey!\nIt'll wash off.
Comment: Breaking a block has a 0.3% chance to spawn a slime

Name: Soul Guard
Description: On that day, the reaper laid down his scythe...\nThis armour siphons its user's life essence to mitigate a portion of incoming damage.
Comment: 90% damage mitigate or 50% of armor-piercing

Name: Soul Rend
Description: Soul steal!\nThis weapon has innate soul-stealing abilities.
Comment: Drom Draconic's Evolution Mob Souls on kill

Name: Spades
Description: Trump suit: Make Tinkers Great Again!\nThe lower your health the more damage you do.
Comment: Tool deals more damage when you're at lower HP

Name: Spectral
Description: It's all a blur!\nThis armour grants its wearer a chance to evade incoming attacks.

Name: Spectre
Description: Spectral\nEach part gives additional Reach potion effect.
Comment: Gain a Reach buff for every tool part made of Spectre, increasing block reach range

Name: Spectre
Description: Spectral\nEach part gives additional Reach potion effect.
Comment: Gain a Reach buff for every tool part made of Spectre, increasing block reach range

Name: Spiky
Description: 200% cooler with spikes!\nBlocking and getting hurt deals damage to the attacker.
Comment: Blocking and taking damage will reflect a bit of damage back at the attacker

Name: Spiny
Description: They're called spines, not spikes!\nGetting hurt deals damage to the attacker at the cost of durability.

Name: Splintering
Description: A souvenir for your enemies!\nHit them more to deal more damage.
Comment: Increases damage the more you hit enemies

Name: Splintering II
Description: A souvenir for your enemies!\nHits them more to deal more damage.

Name: Splinters
Description: Ouch!\nBe careful not to catch a splinter!
Comment: 1% chance to take 0.1 damage after breaking block or hitting enemy

Name: Splitting
Description: Two for one!\nThe sudden acceleration of releasing an arrow might cause it to split into two.
Comment: Chance of projectile being doubled after fire

Name: Splitting II
Description: Three for one!\The sudden acceleration of releasing an arrow cause it to split into three.

Name: Squeaky
Description: Cute.\nYour tool is so soft and squeaky it gained silktouch, but deals no damage.
Comment: Grants silk touch to the tool, but it can no longer do damage

Name: Staggering
Description: ...and stay bashed!\nThis weapon briefly immobilizes enemies on fully-charged hits.
Comment: Fully charged hits temporarily freeze enemies

Name: Stalwart
Description: The Brave and Bold.\nHitting an entity can make you feel emboldened.
Comment: Hitting enemies has a chance to gain Resistance for 10s

Name: Starfishy
Description: 2+2=5\nPress the �set portal� key (default �N�) to set a virtual portal on the block you are pointing at. If you are on the brink of death, you have 32 enori crystals to spare, and the portal has enough space above, then the crystals are consumed, you are teleported to the virtual portal, and you are spared. (The tool must be in your hand).
Comment: Press the "set portal" key (default "N") to set a virtual portal on the block you are pointing at. If you are on the brink of death, you have 32 Enori Crystals in your inventory, and the portal has enough space above, then the crystals are consumed and you are teleported to the location. (The tool must be in your hand to activate)

Name: Steady
Description: Stand your ground!\nLess knockback for you, more for your attacker.

Name: Stiff
Description: Unmoving!\nBlocking reduces the damage taken even more.
Comment: Increases damage reduction from blocking

Name: Stifling
Description: Like punching a rock!\nThis armour weakens attackers.

Name: Stonebound
Description: Your tool absolutely loves stone!\nThe tool mines faster as it wears out, but does less damage.
Comment: Tool mines faster as it loses durability, but reduces tool damage

Name: Stonebound
Description: Your armour absolutely loves stone!\nThis armour grows more effective as it wears out.
Comment: Tool mines faster as it loses durability, but reduces tool damage

Name: Strength of Will
Description: Maintaining focus!\nThis armour grants immortality when hit at full health.

Name: Subterranean
Description: We have to go deeper!\nYour armor is more durable below sea level.

Name: Sundering
Description: Balance is weakness...\nThis weapon weakens attacked enemies.
Comment: Causes weakness on enemies temporarily

Name: Superdense
Description: Not overpowered!\nThis armour slightly mitigates most forms of incoming damage.

Name: Superheat
Description: Turn up the heat!\nDeal bonus damage to enemies on fire.
Comment: +35% bonus damage against burning targets

Name: Superhot
Description: SUPER. HOT.\nYou run faster when you're on fire!

Name: Surf Wax America
Description: "You take your car to work, I'll take my board...:"\nDeals an additional 5 damage when players are riding a mount.

Name: Synergy
Description: Look ma, no moss!\nWill repair itself if you have Steeleaves in your hotbar.
Comment: Will repair itself if you have Steeleaves in your hotbar

Name: Tasty
Description: Om Nom Nom\nSmells so good.. You'd rather eat your tool than starve.
Comment: While holding the tool and hungry, chance to consume 100 durability to increase hunger

Name: Tasty
Description: Om Nom Nom\nSmells so good...You'd rather eat your armor than starve.
Comment: While holding the tool and hungry, chance to consume 100 durability to increase hunger

Name: Terrafirma
Description: Solid earth\nWhile this tool is in your hand (or this armor is worn), you will heal over time.
Comment: While equipped, regenerate HP quicker

Name: Thundergod's Favour
Description: Insulated!\nThis armour grants immunity to lightning strikes.

Name: Thundergod's Wrath
Description: I condemn you!\nThis weapon calls down a bolt of lightning upon enemies struck at full health.

Name: Thundering
Description: Rise, Thor!\nSummon a thunderbolt on impact.
Comment: Hitting enemies will cause a thunder strike

Name: Tom and Jerry
Description: [laughs in flattening Tom]\nExplosions caused by a user with this trait slow down those affected.

Name: Twilit
Description: The Twilight Forest's illuminating blessing.\nSpeedier in the Twilight Forest.\nMore damage outside the Twilight Forest.
Comment: Grants +2 mining speed inside Twilight Forest, grants +2 damage outside Twilight Forest

Name: Ultradense
Description: Extremely not overpowered!\nThis armour significantly mitigates most forms of incoming damage.

Name: Undone
Description: "If you want to destroy my sweater..."\nTargets wearing armor have a 30% chance of their armor being removed from a critical strike.

Name: Unnatural
Description: Abomination!\nThe tool mines faster the higher its mining level is above the required one.
Comment: The tool will mine faster for every mining level it is above the block

Name: Uplifting
Description: This day we fight!\nOccasionally regenerates health on use.
Comment: Breaking blocks and killing enemies has a chance to regenerate HP

Name: Uplifting
Description: I bid you stand!\nOccasionally regenerates health when hit.
Comment: Breaking blocks and killing enemies has a chance to regenerate HP

Name: Vampiric
Description: Still befriending mortals?\nThis weapon drains life energy from enemies to heal its wielder.
Comment: Life-steals from hit enemies

Name: Vanishing
Description: Out of my way!\nChance to teleport enemies away.
Comment: Chance to teleport hit enemies away

Name: Veiled
Description: Like a Specter!\nProjectile will be invisible.
Comment: Projectile becomes invisible

Name: Vengeful
Description: They'll pay for this!\nYour attackers might not feel great after hitting you.

Name: Vindictive
Description: You are not forgiven!\nBonus damage to players, and you gain some health by attacking.
Comment: Increases damage against players

Name: Vis Equillibrium
Description: Depending on vis in aura your tool has better stats.

Name: Vis Siphon
Description: Repairs tool using local vis in aura.

Name: Voice of the Fae
Description: Hey, listen!\nThis weapon may summon pixies to attack foes.
Comment: Chance to summon a pixie to dive bomb the enemy

Name: Voice of the Fae
Description: Hey, listen!\nThis armour may summon pixies to ward off attackers.
Comment: Chance to summon a pixie to dive bomb the enemy

Name: Voltaic
Description: Biribiri!\nGetting hit charges your armor. Once fully charged, get hit again to discharge and deal damage to all surrounding creatures.

Name: Warping
Description: Strange whispers reveal secrets...\nThis accursed weapon saps at the sanity of those that bear its strikes.
Comment: Increases struck targets temporary Warp

Name: Warping
Description: Strange whispers reveal secrets...\nThis accursed plate saps at the sanity of those that would strike it.
Comment: Increases struck targets temporary Warp

Name: Well-Established
Description: Free bonus XP!\nYou gain additional XP.
Comment: Chance to drop extra XP when killing enemies and mining blocks

Name: Whispering
Description: Will occasionally whisper it's will to you
Comment: Occasionally whispers it's thoughts

Name: Willful
Description: Your soul is mine!\nThis armour ensnares the souls of those that would attack it.
Comment: Chance for enemies to drop Demonic Wills

Name: Willful
Description: Your soul is mine!\nThis weapon severs the strands of demonic will that bind its enemies.
Comment: Chance for enemies to drop Demonic Wills

Name: Withering
Description: We may have years, we may have hours...\nWithers enemies on contact.
Comment: Struck enemies gain Wither

Name: Withering
Description: Death makes monsters of us all.\nWithers enemies on hit.
Comment: Struck enemies gain Wither

Name: Writable
Description: Intellectual!\nMore words. More Modifiers. It's only logical!
Comment: Grants +1 modifier
